TEXT.TITLE: LAND SECURITIES ISSUES 100 MLN STG EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Land Securities Plc is issuing a 100 mln stg eurobond due April 29, 2007 with a 9-1/2 pct coupon and priced at 95-3/4, lead manager J. Henry Schroder Wagg and Co Ltd said. The non-callable bonds will be listed in London and will be issued in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 stg. Fees are 1-1/2 pct for selling and one pct for management and underwriting combined with a 3/16 pct praecipuum. The pay date is April 29. REUTER
